headline: FDA awards cancer drug approvals to AbbVie and MSD
summary: The FDA has approved MSD’s Welireg for rare adrenal tumours, and AbbVie’s Emrelis for treating c-Met+ lung cancer patients.

raw.headline: FDA awards cancer drug approvals to AbbVie and MSD
raw.summary: The FDA has approved MSD’s Welireg for rare adrenal tumours, and AbbVie’s Emrelis for treating c-Met+ lung cancer patients.

headline: AbbVie Inc. stock outperforms competitors on strong trading day

headline: AbbVie Secures FDA Nod for New ADC Drug Emrelis in Lung Cancer
summary: Following the approval, ABBV's Emrelis becomes the first FDA-approved therapy for previously treated advanced NSCLC patients with high c-Met protein overexpression.

raw.headline: AbbVie Secures FDA Nod for New ADC Drug Emrelis in Lung Cancer
raw.summary: Following the approval, ABBV's Emrelis becomes the first FDA-approved therapy for previously treated advanced NSCLC patients with high c-Met protein overexpression.

headline: AbbVie stakes $335M on a startup’s RNAi drugs
summary: ADARx Pharmaceuticals will work with AbbVie to make RNA interference medicines for a variety of disease areas, including neurology, immunology and cancer.

raw.headline: AbbVie stakes $335M on a startup’s RNAi drugs
raw.summary: ADARx Pharmaceuticals will work with AbbVie to make RNA interference medicines for a variety of disease areas, including neurology, immunology and cancer.

headline: AbbVie expands siRNA push with $335m ADARx deal
summary: This marks AbbVie’s second major siRNA deal following its $1.4bn acquisition of Aliada Therapeutics last year.

raw.headline: AbbVie expands siRNA push with $335m ADARx deal
raw.summary: This marks AbbVie’s second major siRNA deal following its $1.4bn acquisition of Aliada Therapeutics last year.

headline: FDA approves Roche’s MET protein expression detecting assay for NSQ-NSCLC
summary: Results from the LUMINOSITY study indicated that those with high c-Met protein expression achieved a 35% ORR.

raw.headline: FDA approves Roche’s MET protein expression detecting assay for NSQ-NSCLC
raw.summary: Results from the LUMINOSITY study indicated that those with high c-Met protein expression achieved a 35% ORR.
